statements: SELECT * FROM BatteryMetrics;
SELECT battery_level, health_status FROM BatteryMetrics WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT * FROM BatteryMetrics WHERE health_status = 'good' ORDER BY battery_level DESC;
SELECT device_id, performance_metrics->'temperature' AS temperature FROM BatteryMetrics WHERE battery_level > 50;
SELECT AVG(battery_level) AS average_battery_level FROM BatteryMetrics GROUP BY health_status;
SELECT device_id, battery_level FROM BatteryMetrics WHERE health_status = 'good';
SELECT * FROM BatteryMetrics WHERE battery_level > 50;
SELECT device_id, health_status, performance_metrics FROM BatteryMetrics WHERE battery_level < 20 ORDER BY device_id DESC;
SELECT device_id, battery_level, health_status FROM BatteryMetrics WHERE health_status = 'critical' AND battery_level < 30;
SELECT * FROM BatteryMetrics WHERE health_status <> 'excellent' ORDER BY battery_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM battery_health;
SELECT battery_id, health_status FROM battery_health ORDER BY battery_id DESC;
SELECT id, health_status, voltage FROM battery_health WHERE health_status = 'Good' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT temperature, charge_level FROM performance_metrics WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT id, battery_id, health_status FROM battery_health WHERE health_status = 'Critical' ORDER BY battery_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM battery_health WHERE health_status = 'Good' ORDER BY voltage DESC, id ASC;
SELECT id, health_status, voltage FROM battery_health WHERE battery_id = 100 ORDER BY voltage ASC;
SELECT battery_id, temperature, charge_level FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY battery_id, temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM battery_health WHERE voltage > 4.0 AND health_status = 'Fair' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, battery_id, temperature, charge_level FROM performance_metrics WHERE charge_level BETWEEN 40 AND 80 ORDER BY temperature DESC, battery_id ASC;
SELECT id, device_id, battery_level, temperature, timestamp FROM battery_health_metrics;
SELECT id, timestamp, battery_level, device_id, temperature FROM battery_health_metrics ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT device_id, battery_level, temperature, timestamp FROM battery_health_metrics WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT device_id, AVG(battery_level) AS avg_battery_level FROM battery_health_metrics GROUP BY device_id;
SELECT device_name, location, manufacturer, os_version FROM device_details;
SELECT * FROM battery_health_metrics WHERE battery_level > 50 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT device_id, temperature FROM battery_health_metrics WHERE temperature BETWEEN 25.0 AND 30.0 ORDER BY device_id ASC
SELECT device_name, location FROM device_details WHERE manufacturer = 'Apple'
SELECT device_id, cpu_usage, memory_usage FROM performance_metrics WHERE memory_usage > 80.0 AND cpu_usage < 50.0 ORDER BY cpu_usage DESC
SELECT device_name, os_version FROM device_details WHERE location LIKE '%USA%' ORDER BY device_name
SELECT * FROM battery_health_metrics ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT device_id, cpu_usage FROM performance_metrics WHERE cpu_usage > 80;
SELECT battery_serial_number, charge_level FROM battery_health_metrics WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM location_data WHERE latitude < 45 AND longitude > -100;
SELECT device_id, alert_message, timestamp FROM alert_logs ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM battery_health_metrics ORDER BY charge_level DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT device_id, cpu_usage FROM performance_metrics WHERE memory_usage > 80 ORDER BY cpu_usage DESC
SELECT device_id, latitude, longitude FROM location_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30 AND 40 AND longitude BETWEEN -100 AND -90
SELECT * FROM alert_logs WHERE device_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT battery_serial_number, charge_level, temperature FROM battery_health_metrics ORDER BY battery_serial_number ASC
SELECT * FROM battery_health;
SELECT id, health_status FROM battery_health WHERE capacity > 80;
SELECT * FROM power_consumption ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT device_id, temperature FROM temperature_logs WHERE temperature < 25;
SELECT battery_id, cycle_number FROM charge_cycles WHERE cycle_number BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM battery_health WHERE health_status = 'good';
SELECT battery_id, health_status FROM battery_health ORDER BY health_status DESC;
SELECT id, device_id, temperature FROM temperature_logs WHERE temperature > 30 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT battery_id, cycle_number, start_time, end_time FROM charge_cycles WHERE cycle_number BETWEEN 5 AND 10 ORDER BY cycle_number ASC, start_time ASC;
SELECT id, alert_type, description FROM battery_alerts WHERE alert_type IN ('critical','warning') ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
